original_text: And some of the Hebrews went over Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead. As for Saul, he was yet in Gilgal, and all the people followed him trembling.
korean_text: 어떤 히브리 사람들은 요단을 건너 갓과 길르앗 땅으로 가되 사울은 아직 길갈에 있고 그를 따른 모든 백성은 떨더라

sentences.original_text: And some of the Hebrews went over Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 히브리 사람 중 일부가 요단을 건넜으며

sentences.original_text: to the land of Gad and Gilead
and all the people followed him trembling
